Body:
I would like to add my UWP app to upboard2 device by Windows Device Portal, but in apps manager I don't see the Install App tab.

The version of Iot core installed is 10.0.15063.0 and my windows 10 settings are in developer mode.

Any helps are appreciated Many thanks
Thanks @Naikrovek. I solved this problem adding Install App in Options Menu -> Add Tools to workspace
I've seen that before also, and I'm not sure what is causing it.  I haven't looked into it closely at all.

I solved the problem adding the tab Install App.

  1. Click on options menu
  2. Click Add tools to workspace
  3. Check Install App

I hope it can helps.

"
Thanks for sharing. You can mark this as the answer.
